external_games.name: Emre and Jevon's Tale of Knowledge, Emulating a Dream Where You Gain Wisdom and Knowledge and Probably Meet Hermes

name: Emre and Jevon's Tale of Knowledge, Emulating a Dream Where You Gain Wisdom and Knowledge and Probably Meet Hermes
summary: This is the game we made for the LSD game jam in two weeks even though we had way more time. Its father is the sun and its mother the moon. And it was borne from the earth where it ascends to the heaven and becomes ruler over that which is above and that which is below.
